info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 10 at 10:38AM MST until September 10 at 11:45AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM MST/1145 AM PDT/ THIS MORNING FOR NORTHERN MOHAVE AND NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 1038 AM MST /1038 AM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Radar indicates that up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mesquite, Bunkerville, Scenic, New Gold Butte Road, and Bunkerville Road. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
